parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) I taste, (b) I experience. A primary verb; to taste; by implication, to eat; figuratively, to experience.
Properly, beautiful, but chiefly good, i.e. Valuable or virtuous.
From rheo; an utterance, ; by implication, a matter or topic; with a negative naught whatever.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
And, both. A primary particle of connection or addition; both or also.
From dunamai; force; specially, miraculous power.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: A strengthened form of melo; to intend, i.e. Be about to be, do, or suffer something.
From the same as aei; properly, an age; by extension, perpetuity; by implication, the world; specially a Messianic period.
